prompts: Create a ground-type Pokemon with green skin and a powerful tail for a unique design.
I want an adorable Pokemon that resembles a small dinosaur with a rocky back and bright red eyes.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous regions, showcasing earthy colors and rugged features.
Make a Pokemon that can burrow underground, featuring a stout body and a playful demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon that evolves into a fierce creature, starting as a small, green, rock-like figure.
Design a unique Pokemon that can camouflage in forest areas with its green and brown colors.
Show me a Pokemon that has a mix of cute and tough characteristics, perfect for battle.
